snippet.title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls — Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
It is time for us to declare all-out war on these Ryoka.

ACCEPT YOUR SOUL AND REVERSE FATE.
BLEACH Rebirth of Souls comes to PlayStation, Xbox, and PC 21st March, 2025!

Pre-order to get the THOUSAND-YEAR BLOOD WAR COSTUME SET for Hitsugaya and Yoruichi: https://bnent.eu/Preorder-BleachRoS 

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://x.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bandainamcoeu

#BLEACHRoS
